[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | WARNING:API 'android.registerTransform' is obsolete.
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | It will be removed in version 8.0 of the Android Gradle plugin.
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | The Transform API is removed to improve build performance. Projects that use the
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | Transform API force the Android Gradle plugin to use a less optimized flow for the
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | build that can result in large regressions in build times. It’s also difficult to
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | use the Transform API and combine it with other Gradle features; the replacement
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | APIs aim to make it easier to extend the build without introducing performance or
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | correctness issues.
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | 
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | There is no single replacement for the Transform API—there are new, targeted
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | APIs for each use case. All the replacement APIs are in the
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | `androidComponents {}` block.
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | For more information, see https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/gradle-plugin-api-updates#transform-api.
[97ef6944-2363-4621-bfef-c8a9c6153e0b/build]   | To determine what is calling android.registerTransform, use -Pandroid.debug.obsoleteApi=true on the command line to display more information.
